page.title: 06Midland computer bank.
page.content:
This computer bank has a distinctive architectural appearance.In some ways it resembles the superstructure of a ship.It has the appearance of having two 'decks' and has air vents which resemble those used on ships.
The bank does not handle 'real' money but computer transactions from all over the world.Security is very tight and only people with special passes are allowed in.One hundred and eighty people work there.The bank uses large Main Frame computers.There are diesel generators which come in if the electricity supply fails.There is also a nuclear shelter to protect computer records and personel.
